name: CommandStackEvent
description: Event class which will be fired for every CommandStack operation. Required for CommandStackListener.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Create a new CommandStack objects which can be execute via the CommandStack.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: the current state of the command execution

functions.name: getStack
functions.description: Return the corresponding stack of the event.

functions.name: getCommand
functions.description: Returns null or a Command if a command is relevant to the current event.

functions.name: getDetails
functions.description: Returns an integer identifying the type of event which has occurred. Defined by {@link draw2d.command.CommandStack}.

functions.name: isPostChangeEvent
functions.description: Returns true if this event is fired after the stack having changed.

functions.name: isPreChangeEvent
functions.description: Returns true if this event is fired prior to the stack changing.
